ygData.subject: Re: staff of writhing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Both. Dex affects how often a weapon will proc.  Procs are level dependent.  Before you hit the level, it will give you a message, but no effects
ygData.messageBody:
Lim Dul wrote:

> From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
>
> Anybody know how the secondary spell Chaotic Effect takes place? Is it
> level dependant or DEX dependant? I've been assuming it was dependant on my
> level...but yesterday I was grouped with a bard that was singing a song to
> increase DEX. Lo and behold, the staff was going off on spells! It was
> pretty cool, it hit for 48 dmg.
>
> I'm level 28, and with the bard's buff, my DEX was about 86.
>
> -- Lim'Dul

Both.

Dex affects how often a weapon will proc. Procs are level dependent. Before
you hit the level, it will give you a message, but no effects
